items.sentence: Tom and Mary have known each other since 2013.
Tom and Mary headed off in the same direction.
Tom and Mary looked at each other and laughed.
I wanted to help, but I couldn\'t do anything.
I wanted to stop by and see how you\'re doing.
I wanted to tell Tom that I couldn\'t do that.
I think Tom said he\'s already read this book.
I think it\'s dangerous to swim in this river.
Tom\'s car is the only one in the parking lot.
Tom waited for Mary to speak, but she didn\'t.
